body:
This won't work if channels_ is 0.

I think my suggestion would be as follows:

If the user provides channels_ != 0, validate that channels_ = bpp / 8 as you do above.

But in the rest of the code, always use bpp / 8 as the channels you use to allocate the tensor and pass into the Decode function.  Does that make sense?

body_text:
This won't work if channels_ is 0.
I think my suggestion would be as follows:
If the user provides channels_ != 0, validate that channels_ = bpp / 8 as you do above.
But in the rest of the code, always use bpp / 8 as the channels you use to allocate the tensor and pass into the Decode function.  Does that make sense?
